sentences.en: a short compact-looking man
sentences.cn: 个子矮小、看上去很敦实的男子

sentences.en: Compact discs have brought about a vast improvement in recorded sound quality.
sentences.cn: 激光唱片极大地提高了录音的音质。

sentences.en: compacted earth
sentences.cn: 压实的土壤

sentences.en: He looked physically very powerful, athletic in a compact way.
sentences.cn: 他看上去非常强壮，像个敦实的运动员。

sentences.en: He took the compact disc from her, then fed it into the player.
sentences.cn: 他从她手里接过光盘，放入播放机中。

sentences.en: He was compact, probably no taller than me.
sentences.cn: 他矮小壮实，可能并不比我高。

sentences.en: It is significantly more compact than any comparable laptop, with no loss in functionality.
sentences.cn: 它比同类笔记本电脑小巧很多，但功能未减。

sentences.en: It was a compact package.
sentences.cn: 这是个捆得很紧的包裹.

sentences.en: Photos taken by compact cameras are often dark because they're slightly underexposed.
sentences.cn: 袖珍相机所拍的照片往往比较暗，因为存在轻微的曝光不足。

sentences.en: Sony has also led the way in shrinking the size of compact-disc players.
sentences.cn: 索尼公司在缩小CD播放机的体积方面也处于领先地位。

sentences.en: Stamp the soil down so that it's compact.
sentences.cn: 把泥土踩结实.

sentences.en: The article is compact and carefully constructed.
sentences.cn: 文章结构谨严.

sentences.en: The article is compact and well organized.
sentences.cn: 文章严密,又很有章法.

sentences.en: The bushes grew in a compact mass.
sentences.cn: 灌木长成茂密的一片。

sentences.en: The compact design of the machine allows it to be stored easily.
sentences.cn: 这台机器的设计小巧灵便，易于存放。

sentences.en: The compact disc is a miracle of modern technology.
sentences.cn: 激光唱片是当代技术的奇迹.

sentences.en: The kitchen is compact but well equipped.
sentences.cn: 这间厨房虽然小但设备齐全。

sentences.en: The soundtrack of "Highlander II" will be released on compact disc at Easter.
sentences.cn: 《挑战者2》的电影原声光盘将在复活节时发行。

sentences.en: The students’ rooms were compact, with a desk, bed, and closet built in.
sentences.cn: 学生的房间很小巧，配有一张书桌、一张床和一个壁橱。

sentences.en: Try to compact the sand into the mold.
sentences.cn: 设法把这沙土堆积到模子里.

words.tran_cn: 简洁；紧密；密实度；紧密度
压土机；垃圾捣碎机；夯土机；[建] 压实器

phrases.tran_cn: 紧凑结构；紧密结合形式
紧凑型（小型）；超小型设计；小型袖珍型

trans.tran_en: packed or put together firmly and closely
a small flat container with a mirror, containing powder for a woman’s face
to press something together so that it becomes smaller or more solid
to press something together so that it becomes smaller or more solid
